String.Source: It's been a long time since I've spent so many hours outside. Yesterday I think I burned the scales on my nose. It was a peculiar feeling.
String.Dest: 我已经有日子没像昨天一样呆在屋外那么久了。我想我鼻子上的鳞片都烧着了。那感觉可真奇怪。

String.Source: Cloudy days almost seem mean spirited, as Skyrim has enough gloom already. However, ours is not to question the wisdom of Kynareth.
String.Dest: 多云的日子意味着生机勃勃，而如今的天际太过于抑郁。虽然，我们不该质疑凯娜瑞斯的智慧。

String.Source: It was raining the day I met my wife. I mentioned to her how awful the weather was. She said, "What's wrong, don't know how to swim?"
String.Dest: 我遇见我妻子的那天下着瓢泼大雨。我跟她抱怨天气真是糟透了。她对我说：“有什么糟糕的，难道你不会游泳吗？”

String.Source: I was married once, you know. We lived in a small town not unlike this one, west of the Imperial City. I never told her about my life in The Order.
String.Dest: 我结过一次婚的。我们住在跟这差不多的一座小镇，帝国城市的西边。我从没告诉过她我在 The Order 的经历。

String.Source: In the end, it wasn't the late nights or bad excuses. I could have my secrets. She wanted the rest of me, and I was unable to give it to her.
String.Dest: 最终，根本不是因为夜太深或别的烂借口。只是我有我的秘密。她却想知道我的一切，但我不能告诉她。

String.Source: When I spoke of war, I did not mean that which occurs between mortals. Those wars are undoubtedly a failure to bridge our differences.
String.Dest: 当我谈到战争，我并不意味着那些在凡人之前发生的事情。那些战争在消除我们之间的分歧上毋庸置疑是一次失败。

String.Source: Before I was hatched, my mother had a vision of me wading amongst the Hist trees, and with that I had my name.
String.Dest: Before I was hatched, my mother had a vision of me wading amongst the Hist trees, and with that I had my name.

String.Source: The art of bargaining was never one I was able to master. There is a level of stubbornness required that I simply cannot uphold.
String.Dest: 我一直都没能掌握讨价还价的艺术。讨价还价这事儿需要相当顽强的意志，我就是没法办到这一点。

String.Source: The inn is the heartbeat of every city, and it is wise to gauge its pulse before venturing out.
String.Dest: 旅馆是每一座城市的心跳，最聪明的做法莫过于在探险之前测量它的脉搏。

String.Source: In cities like this, it's easy to lose trust. It was my wife who taught me there was a fine line between guarding yourself and being guarded.
String.Dest: 在像这样的城市里，信任很容易被抛到脑后。是我的妻子教我辨别保护你自己和被别人保护的微妙界限。

String.Source: The Rift reminds me of my wife. Hers was an Argonian with jewels on her horns, sunlight on her breath, and scales as vibrant as the autumn leaves.
String.Dest: 裂痕领使我想起了我的妻子。她是一名亚龙人。她头上的角像珠宝一样润滑而光泽，她的每一次呼吸都带着阳光的味道，她身上的鳞片鲜亮的如同秋天的落叶。

String.Source: So many ships sail out into the great wide yonder never to return. We should appreciate the sailors who provide us with the goods to live in comfort.
String.Dest: 有那么多船航向了宽阔的大海就再也没回来。我们应该感谢那些给我们带来物资并让我们过上舒适生活的海员们。

String.Source: The small hamlets were often an easy target for the nightwalkers. Less guards, more cover. Ours is to sleep with his tail against the door.
String.Dest: 小村庄往往容易成为nightwalkers的目标。护卫更少，掩体更多。我们的靠着自己的尾巴在门边睡觉。

String.Source: Bandits. Killing them will not make our roads safe, nor will sparing them end their poverty. The root of the problem lies elsewhere.
String.Dest: 强盗啊。即使把他们杀了，我们这一路上也安全不了，放过他们吧，他们也还是穷的叮当响。问题的根源不在这里。

String.Source: Falion. Speak with him, glean what you can. Ours is to listen. Perhaps later I will address my own questions.
String.Dest: Falion. Speak with him, glean what you can. Ours is to listen. Perhaps later I will address my own questions.

String.Source: The Arcane University in Cyrodiil is guarded heavily by the Imperial Watch. It seems the College of Winterhold relies on isolation.
String.Dest: 在赛瑞迪尔的那个奥术大学可是由帝国守卫们重兵把守着。而冬堡学院就相对有点与世隔绝了。

String.Source: If Arlas is right, and sickness is a virtue, then this one can still be saved. Point her to Falion in Morthal, if you have not already.
String.Dest: 如果阿尔拉丝是正确的，软弱是一种美德，那么这个人仍可以获救。如果你还没有这么做，那么指给她去莫萨尔的法利昂的路。

String.Source: I have heard disturbing stories of vampires phasing through the ice floes that line the White River. It would be safe to always use the bridge.
String.Dest: 我听说过那个让人不安的故事，讲的是吸血鬼沿着白河一步步的走过浮冰。要是走桥的话它会更安全些。

String.Source: The death of Movarth Piquine is indeed something to be celebrated by the people of Morthal. Theirs is to smile at your deeds.
String.Dest: Movarth Piquine的死对于墨索尔城的市民而言，确实是一件值得庆祝的事情。Theirs is to smile at your deeds.

String.Source: They say that Movarth Piquine was not unlike myself. His was a dedication to slaying the unliving. It only confirms that vampirism corrupts.
String.Dest: 【他们说莫瓦斯·皮其恩并不像我。他曾致力于屠杀不死生物。只能说吸血鬼也堕落了啊】。

String.Source: The rumors the locals dispense about Falion are disturbing. It is our understanding that he is a man of impeccable skill and character.
String.Dest: 当地的谣言却独独没有传到法利昂耳中。不过我们可以理解。毕竟他的本事和性格都无可挑剔。

String.Source: It is as I feared. The unliving have infected this town. Let us purge it of this evil.
String.Dest: 正如我所恐惧的那样。那些不死的家伙正在感染这座城镇。让我们把城镇从这恶魔手里给拯救出来吧。.

String.Source: Something is not right about this town. The sky casts a cloud over the eyes of its residents, and portends a rain of tears.
String.Dest: 这个镇子有些事情不对劲。居民们满面愁云惨雾，简直要泪洒当场了。

String.Source: What can mortals scry from the disappearance of the Dwemer? If they were an advanced race, is our life naught but a march toward the same fate?
String.Dest: 凡人怎么才能用水晶球占卜到了锻莫的消失？如果他们是一个先进的种族，难道我们的生活最终会化为乌有，遭受与他们相同的命运吗？

String.Source: Bandian wrote it took 7 months for the Draugr to accept her among them. If only we had such patience. If only they didn't ask for the impossible.
String.Dest: Bandian说尸鬼花了7个月的时间才接纳她，如果我们那么耐心，那么放低姿态就好了。

String.Source: During the day, the sun washes over this city and warms the paths of stone. A vampire hunter can almost be at ease in such a surrounding.
String.Dest: 在白天，太阳的光辉洗洒过这座城市，温暖了石砌的小径。一个吸血鬼猎人在这样的环境中几乎都可以安下心来。

String.Source: It is sad to see any mortal so desperate for eternal life that they would fail to see that merely existing is as hollow as the void.
String.Dest: 看到人们不顾一切地追求永生真是种悲哀，他们看不透那毫无意义的存在就像虚空一样空虚

String.Source: These servants of the dragon priests have rotted over time. One might be able to pinpoint the age of a barrow but the rot of its Draugr.
String.Dest: 随着时间的推移，这些龙祭祀的仆从慢慢腐烂了。除了看尸鬼的腐烂程度，我们也许有别的法子来判断这个手推车的年头。

String.Source: Not many people can find the place, to be honest, since it's not on any map.
String.Dest: 说实话，没多少人能找到这个地方。因为那里在任何一份地图上都没有标示。

String.Source: How do you know the scene hasn't been tampered with?
String.Dest: 你们怎么能确保现在看到的这些没有被篡改过。

String.Source: The only reason the guard were able to arrest my father is because he was forced to spend the night in Solitude.
String.Dest: 守卫逮捕我父亲唯一可行的理由就是他非自愿而不得不在独孤城过了一夜。

String.Source: How do you know the scene hasn't been tampered with?
String.Dest: 你们怎么能确保现在看到的这些没有被篡改过。

String.Source: Thank you. I'm sure with an enchantment, it'll fetch a good price.
String.Dest: 谢谢你。我肯定这东西被附魔了，它会卖个好价钱。

String.Source: Ours is to smile at your presence Filnjar. I am need of your eyes, and your expertise. Can you appraise this dagger I found?
String.Dest: 我们是在为你的出席而微笑， Filnjar。我需要你的眼力，和知识。你能评估一下这把我找到的匕首吗？

String.Source: Yours is to lead, ours is to follow.
String.Dest: 你若领导，我们追随。

String.Source: Follow me. I need your help.
String.Dest: 跟着我。我需要你的帮助。

String.Source: Let the light illuminate the shadow.
String.Dest: 让光明照亮阴影。

String.Source: Yours is to pass, and ours is to delight.
String.Dest: 你只需要通过，我们只需要取乐。

String.Source: Ours is to apologize Grogmar. I have a habit of studying faces.
String.Dest: Ours is to apologize Grogmar. I have a habit of studying faces.
